name: G3: Gaming and Giving for Good 2012
name_original: G3: Gaming and Giving for Good 2012
description: Donate to Children's Miracle Network by purchasing this picture pack. Each pack contains five charity Gamer Pictures. You can also participate by going to www.xbox.com/G3, signing up a team and playing your favorite games on August, 18, 2012. Complete details are available at www.xbox.com/G3
